channel.title: Client help
channel.description: I can never open up peoples clients. LIke i download the client and everything click run... and it opens fine, then i create a username and password then it says error connecting to server. Please help? Also i do have the latest java installed and does firewall have to do with anything? I really need help with this so i can use clients.
